data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_08770893183018333f54a98e63c41ee3.png

skilllist.skilldesc:
If Lesley doesn't take damage for 5s, her next Basic Attack gains extra range and 50% Crit Chance and deals 100<font color="fba51f"> (+100% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> (20% extra damage against minions).

Each point of fixed Physical Penetration Lesley acquires is converted into 0.5% Crit Damage, but her base Crit Damage is reduced to 130%.

Lesley's Basic Attack restores 5 points of energy and her <font color="a6aafb">Lethal Shot</font> doubles the amount of energy restored. The <font color="a6aafb">Lethal Shot</font> effect will activate immediately after Lesley uses a skill.

Lesley enters the Camouflage state, gaining double Energy Regen, 40% extra Movement Speed, and 85 extra Physical Attack.

The state lasts 3s or until Lesley takes or deals damage. Enemies can detect Lesley's position through distortions of their surroundings.

Lesley throws a tactical grenade in the target direction while jumping back slightly, dealing 150<font color="fba51f"> (+50% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> to enemies in a fan-shaped area and knocking them back.

Lesley can cast this skill during <font color="a6aafb">Ultimate Snipe</font> to cancel the state and immediately fire a Fatal Bullet at the target. The attack is only triggered when there are unfired Fatal Bullets left.

Lesley locks onto the target enemy hero and fires 4 Fatal Bullets in succession, each dealing <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> equal to 250<font color="fba51f"> (+80% Extra Physical Attack)</font> plus 5% of their lost HP and restoring 10 energy on hit. The Bullets can be blocked by other enemy heroes.

If this skill is interrupted, each remaining Bullet reduces the skill cooldown by 10%.

<font color="a6aafb">Passive</font>: Lesley's Crit Chance is increased by 5%.

data.name: Lesley

__data.skilldesc: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain <Num1> extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for <Num2>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Blink a fixed distance in the target direction and gain 5 (+1*Hero Level) extra Physical & Magic Defense afterward for 1s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Gold Lane: Relying on Passive for damage, has high True Damage in the late game.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+15% Extra Attack Speed
+16 Adaptive Attack
+5% Lifesteal

emblemskill.skilldesc: Gain 5% extra Crit Chance and 10% extra Crit Damage.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num1> extra Crit Chance and <%Num2> extra Crit Damage.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Gain 5% extra Crit Chance and 10% extra Crit Damage.

emblemskill.skilldesc: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Physical Attack and Magic Power gained from equipment, emblem, talents, and skills are increased by 5%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by <%Num2> for <Num1>s and restores <Num3> HP (scales with level).########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num4>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage with Basic Attacks increases Movement Speed by 30% for 1.5s and restores 75-180 HP (scales with level).

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 8s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill1: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Doom: Critical strikes grant 5% extra Physical Attack for 2s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+40% Crit Damage
+65 Extra Physical Attack
+25% Crit Chance

equiplist.equipskill1: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Typhoon: Every 5-2s (reduced by 0.2s for each Basic Attack), the next Basic Attack will hit up to 3 enemy units for 150-362 Magic Damage. (This attack can Crit and the damage increases to 200% against Minions.)
equiplist.equiptips:
+35% Extra Attack Speed
+20% Crit Chance
+20 Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
equiplist.equipskill2: Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Divine Justice: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3s deals <font color="fba51f"> (+0.6 Total Physical Attack)</font> extra True Damage (1.5s cooldown).
Chase Fate: Triggering Divine Justice grants 10% extra Movement Speed.
equiplist.equiptips:
+60 Extra Physical Attack
+250 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+8% Hybrid Lifesteal
+5% Movement Speed
+5 Mana Regen

equiplist.equipskill1: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Lethality: After dealing damage to an enemy hero, executes the hero if their HP is lower than 4%. Gains 10 stack(s) of Lethality for each kill and loses 30% of current stack(s) for each death. Each stack of Lethality increases the HP threshold of the execute effect by 0.1%, stacking up to 80 times.

equiplist.equipskill1: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Despair: Dealing damage to non-Minion enemies below 50% HP increases Physical Attack by 25% for 2s (takes effect before the damage is dealt).

recommendmasterplan.name: The Prestige X İ A O
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

data.story: Adopted daughter of House Vance, a clandestine sniper.

assist.desc: Lesley works best with tank heroes who can provide better attacking conditions for her, like Minotaur and Baxia.

strong.desc: Lesley is strong against tank heroes who rely heavily on equipment. Because her attacks can deal True Damage that will ignore the defense these heroes get from the equipment. Such as Gatotkaca and Fredrinn.

weak.desc: Lesley is countered by Assassin heroes with multiple movement abilities, which will cause her to lose her range advantage. Such as Ling and Lancelot.
